scripts.biome:validate: biome format --css-parse-tailwind-directives=true && biome lint --css-parse-tailwind-directives=true && biome check
scripts.biome:fix: biome format --write --css-parse-tailwind-directives=true && biome lint --write --css-parse-tailwind-directives=true && biome check --write
scripts.biome:fix-unsafe: biome format --write --css-parse-tailwind-directives=true && biome lint --write --css-parse-tailwind-directives=true && biome check --write --unsafe
